ygData.subject: Re: Debate (important everyone read)
ygData.msgSnippet: Ugh.. Dewboy your not getting it... A charachters beast mode has nothing to do with a story. A charachters alternate mode has nothing to do with a story. Who

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Ugh.. Dewboy your not getting it... A charachters beast mode has nothing to 
do with a story. A charachters alternate mode has nothing to do with a story. 
Who cares if a person turns into a zebra to go grocery shopping? You fail to 
look at the bigger picture, but believe me, if the RPG took place on 
Cybertron and planets in its system, more people would participate. The RPG 
would then be more interesting.

--part1_3c.14d8ea20.292d8cb8_boundary
